eduversum.name: KLettres
eduversum.description: KLettres is designed to help the user to learn the alphabet in a new language and then to learn to read simple syllables. The program is suitable for children which are 2 years old or older but also for adults that want to learn the basics of a foreign language. At this time there are 11 languages available: Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, French, German, Hindi (romanized), Italian, Luganda, Spanish, Slovak. English and French are preinstalled.
